about_the_game:
Normal Person is a single player horror/comedy story driven game
Will you be able to escape? Do you even want to escape? Will you be stuck in a limbo with the man who claims to be a "Normal person"

This game is choice based and your choices and actions matter! Put together clues and look around you surrounding for anything that might help you escape.


More details:
The game is in first person and is mostly focused on your choices and dialogue
Fully voiced
Original artwork
Narrative based

This game is currently in early development!
Note: Steam wants me to write a lot about this game for it to be approved for the store but I don't want to give too much away and keep it as vague as possible!

content_descriptors.notes: Some death scenes, gore, swearing and jump scares

name: Normal Person

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.3 Ghz and above
  • Graphics: 1GB of VRAM

short_description: Normal Person is a single player horror, first person Visual Novel where your choices matter! Will you be able to escape or will you be stuck in a limbo with the man who claims to be a "Normal person"
